doc.title: William Trimble: A Saxophone Introspective
doc.plot: William Trimble, leading classical and avant-garde saxophonist, gives a historical and introspective discourse on the saxophone and its evolution in the 20th century. With a career spanning more than 40 years, Trimble discusses the early history of the saxophone and the composers and performers who shaped its history. This film covers many musical genres from classical to avant-garde to jazz, including performance demonstration.
